title: (Gameplay) Deep Sea Nami skin
body: The Deep Sea Nami skin is 100% bugged. Her voice is extra loud even if sound is turned down to 1 and also lags my FPS every time she appears on my screen.

replies.body:
Hey Lanapeed! 

Thanks for the report! I've been playing this skin quite a bit (and against her a few times), and I haven't noticed this. I can poke around and see what may be going on. :) Would you mind giving me a copy of your DxDiag? 

you can grab it by - 

* Press [Windows Key] (that is the key on the left side of the space bar, between ctrl and alt) + 'R'
* Type dxdiag in the search bar and hit 'Ok'
* The DirectX Diagnostic Tool will open. Press the "Save All Information..." button.
* Choose where to save the file (for example, your desktop).

Thanks in advance! :)
